abstracts.cdata!:
This is the Project Completion Report
            (PCR) for the Rural Projects Fund Project in Chad, for which
            credit was approved on November30, 1976. Because of civil
            war disturbances, the credit was revised in May 1985. The
            credit was closed on June 30, 1988. It was fully disbursed
            and the last disbursement was on April 18, 1988. Physical
            targets were substantially revised after the war. Given the
            1984 revised objectives, at the closing dates: (i) under
            small-scale irrigation, pump maintenance was financed
            entirely by farmers and water charge collections from
            farmers attained 862, and four perimeters (out of ten) for a
            total of 40 ha were cultivated with millet and sorghum with
            supplementary irrigation; (ii) under village stores, 80
            stores (as planned) were officially accepted; under feeder
            roads, 2,300 km had been regraded (out of 2,500 km) and the
            Feeder Roads Brigade Management transferred to Cotontchad;
            and (iv) under water supply, 57 water points completed (out
            of 110), and 110 hand pumps had been received and officially accepted.
